root.description: Project's root directory, the relative path to the directory of the main schema file such as `./schemas` and `./src`

main.description: The entity file such as `main.schema.json` or `schema.json` or `model.schema.json`

schema.description: Relative output file path for the compiled schema such as `../dist/schema.json`

type.description: Relative output file path for the compiled type such as `../src/type.ts`
